basic_info.description: ðŸ‘‹ I'm Erin Ranta. I am a software developer based out of New York City. I have always been in the field of helping people improve their lives, and now I strive to do that with technology. I also bring my creative eye with me and am excited to blend creativity with technology.

projects.title: Odd-Duck
projects.description: This was a project from my 201 course where I implemented a random generator to gather and save data by saving clicks on a favorite image item from the user. Javascript, CSS, HTML, and Chart.js were used.

projects.title: Cloud-Ten
projects.description: Cloud-Ten was our 201 group project. I worked on a lot of the front page styling, and a form that users enter data. It was my first time using animations via CSS. The project included Javascript, HTML, and CSS.

projects.title: 3D Object Viewer
projects.description: One of the first apps I was working on my internship. I had to develop front-end implementation for app that shows 3D models of known buildings. This was also my first project in Angular framework. I've learned a lot!
